Class FieldIterablePosting

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.postings.BasicPostingImpl
      • org.terrier.structures.postings.bit.BasicIterablePosting
        • org.terrier.structures.postings.bit.FieldIterablePosting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, FieldPosting, IterablePosting, Posting, WritablePosting

    public class FieldIterablePosting
extends BasicIterablePosting
implements FieldPosting
    A posting iterator for field postings.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Craig Macdonald
    See Also:
    Posting, IterablePosting, FieldPosting, Serialized Form
